title: 44.7 (LOA)
content:
Kordo gives you a grin and lets out a whoop that echoes off of the underground chamber walls. He is on the hunt, and nothing is going to distract him.

If the Wild Scuttlebus is in play, add 3   to the Wild Scuttlebus and discard all   from Kordo (he does not discard). Otherwise, discard Kordo and each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
